revision.text:
{{codepointer|Special action}}'''A_KeenDie''' [(int ''tag'')] {{doomwiki|A_KeenDie}}
Checks whether all actors of the calling actor's type are dead and if so opens all doors with the tag 666.
If ''tag'' is specified, it will be used in place of 666.
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:CommanderKeen|Commander Keen]] decoration.
Death: KEEN AB 6 KEEN C 6 [[A_Scream]] KEEN DEFGH 6 KEEN I 6 [[A_NoBlocking]] KEEN J 6 KEEN K 6 A_KeenDie KEEN L -1 Stop
